column2: Life Storage, Inc. is a real estate investment trust, which engages in the acquisition, ownership, and management of self-storage properties. The company is headquartered in Williamsville, New York and currently employs 1,953 full-time employees. The firm acquires, owns and manages self-storage properties. The firm owns its assets and conducts its operations through Life Storage LP (the Operating Partnership) and subsidiaries of the Operating Partnership. The firm operates over 775 storage facilities in 28 states under the names Life Storage and Uncle Bob's Self Storage. The firm's properties are located in various states of the United States, such as Alabama, Arizona, Colorado, California, Florida, Georgia, Maine, Kentucky, Nevada, New Jersey, Ohio, North Carolina, South Carolina, Texas, Utah and Virginia.
